name: luisgen
description: LUISGen is a tool for generating C# class or Typescript interface for a LUIS app to make consuming LUIS output easier.
author: Microsoft

scripts.preinstall: node -e "require('child_process').exec('dotnet tool -h', (error, out,err) => { if (error) { require('opn')('https://www.microsoft.com/net/download').then(()=>{ console.error('You need to install Dotnet SDK 2.1 from https://www.microsoft.com/net/download'); process.exit(1);}); }});"
